comments:
After renaming a project through the refactoring menu, I couldn't commit this 
project to CVS any longer from the synchronize view. Taking a look at the CVS 
properties of the project I got a message that the cvs info was missing or 
corrupted. Restarting Eclipse removed the problem.

I found the following in the logfile, which *might* be connected to the problem:

The problem is that the rename refactoring and the resulting IProject#move 
operation gets jumbled up by the NPE caused by the launch configuration. Moving 
to Debug.
Fixed with launch history re-work. Please verify, Joe.
